member.name: T:SVN_Automation.clsVerification
member.summary: Class file for process

member.name: M:SVN_Automation.clsVerification.setEvnVariable
member.summary: TO set the Environmental variable for SVN to executes its commands. Input: Finding the visualSVN path by using registry and adding "bin" to that path Output: Setting the environment for SVN

member.name: M:SVN_Automation.clsVerification.CheckLoginLive
member.summary: Check whether the user and Live server URL enter is valid or not Input: User given data Username, password and Live Server URL Output: Check the given compination of username, password and URL are correct or not

member.name: M:SVN_Automation.clsVerification.CheckLoginBack
member.summary: Check whether the user and Backup/Restored server URL enter is valid or not Input: User given data Username, password and Backup/Restored Server URL Output: Check the given compination of username, password and URL are correct or not

member.name: M:SVN_Automation.clsVerification.mtdCreateUser
member.summary: If user doesn't exist, it will create the user in local VisualSVN server. Input: User given data user name, password Output: Creating the user in Local Visual SVN server

member.name: M:SVN_Automation.clsVerification.mtdCreateRepo
member.summary: Create a temporary Repository for Comparison Input: Name of the repository which is created at run time Output: Temporary repository is created

member.name: M:SVN_Automation.clsVerification.mtdGiveAccess
member.summary: Providing access to created repository Input: Repository path where its created at run time Output: creating the access file to the repository

member.name: M:SVN_Automation.clsVerification.mtdGetUrl
member.summary: Get the URL for the created repository Input: Temporary repository name Output: URL for that repository

member.name: M:SVN_Automation.clsVerification.mtdChkLive
member.summary: Check out the files from Live SVN repository for particular date, here we had used commandprompt command to do so Input: User details username, password, backup/restored date and live svn server url Output: Checking out the files from Live SVN repository

member.name: M:SVN_Automation.clsVerification.mtdChkBack
member.summary: Check out the files from Backup/Restored SVN repository for particular date, here we had used commandprompt command to do so Input: User details username, password, backup/restored date and Backup/Restored svn server url Output: Checking out the files from Backup/Restored SVN repository

member.name: M:SVN_Automation.clsVerification.mtdImpLive
member.summary: Importing the check outed live repository file to local VisualSVN server for comparison Input: Check out files from live svn repository Output: File are imported to local repository

member.name: M:SVN_Automation.clsVerification.mtdImpBack
member.summary: Importing the check outed backup/restored repository file to local VisualSVN server for comparison Input: Check out files from backup/restored svn repository Output: File are imported to local repository

member.name: M:SVN_Automation.clsVerification.mtdFindDiff
member.summary: Finding the diffrence between two folders in the local repository Input: Imported files in two folder "Live" and "Backup/Restored" Output: Getting the difference between this two folders
